rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0001
rows.name:
We rushed outside with enthusiasm,
but what exactly do we need to
finish this artificial Blade?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0002
rows.name:
One Perfect Range Sensor and
three Bion Connectors!

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0003
rows.name: I've never heard those terms before.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0004
rows.name:
The Perfect Range Sensor helps
with the artificial Blade's
vision capabilities.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0005
rows.name: This is quite an expensive material.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0006
rows.name: And what do the Bion Connectors do?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0007
rows.name:
There are various uses,
but mainly to prevent the hat
from falling off.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Would an ordinary piece of string
not suffice...?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0009
rows.name: So where can we buy these items?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0011
rows.name:
You'll find it just off to the left
after you enter Torigo.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0012
rows.name:
I think we've walked
past that place before.
